name: Ronald Seiberling
text: A Gang Mechanical is no longer in business.  It provided excellent service for years, but the owner has retired.

name: Steven Belcher
text: I always get treated with the upmost respect and kindness from Bubba Hill nearly always has what I'm looking for at the lowest prices in town! And if he don't have it he's quick to point me in the right direction to find it! Excellent service and overall a great place to buy used Auto parts!

name: Farrid j Ridgeway
text: They are willing to do whatever it takes to help you out a bunch of good guy I recommend them to help anyone

name: Isaac Redding
text: Told me one price and then charged another.  Most of the tires that they have aren't worth putting on a car.

resp.text: Tire Champ has been closed for many years. What business are you reviewing? Thx.

name: Cornelius Broadnax
text: Sells bad tires. Bought tire Friday flat Saturday morning

resp.text: Tire Champ has been closed for many years. I'm not sure where you bought a bad tire?

name: Joseph Wolf
text: Veteran owned and operated. Quality service at low prices.

resp.text: Really we had to close because our prices we so cheap, lol
